document_data.mainbody:
theruses4|the deity worshiped in the Spine of the World|god of the yak-men of Zakhara|The Faceless God}} 
The '''Forgotten God''' was a mysterious deity worshiped at a temple in the [[Spine of the World]] mountains.
document_data.Worshipers: Nothing was known about the Forgotten God except that his priests, referred to as acolytes, gained priestly powers from someone. Giant statues of a robed hooded figure stood outside the temple and another sat in meditation inside the entrance to the temple. This figure could be the Forgotten God, or someone else.
